alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 4:49AM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of five inches, and ice accumulations in excess of one-quarter of an inch are possible. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, central, northern, northwest and western Virginia and eastern and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett
